data.name: NekoPunk Demo
data.detailed_description:
Savage catgirls for savage gamers!




Humanity has been extinct. Now, there is even worse.
Yo dawg, I heard you like catgirls, punk music and savage roguelikes. What about a savage roguelike with savage catgirls and punk music? Grab your rebel state of mind and try to get out of captivity! Oh, and by the way, make a total mess in these procedurally generated mazes!

Choose your favourite rebel catgirl and shoot your way to freedom in this brutal twin-stick shooter roguelike! And to top it all, we have a lot of dirty punchlines and grotesque sense of humor! There is almost no meta-progress. Know the game, know your enemy, know and sharpen your skills until you beat the game!

What is NekoPunk about?


  • 4 savage catgirls, each with her strengths and weaknesses! actually 2 in the demo, and you have to unlock the second one.
  • 6 areas to explore, each with 3 procedurally generated levels, each with tons of hand-designed rooms! Actually only one area in the demo.
  • 6 bosses with deadly patterns! Actually only one in the demo.
  • Catgirls with weapons are cute.
  • Savage music!
  • Savage pixel art design!
  • Many different foes, each with its own patterns and more to come!
  • 5 different weapons and more to come!
  • Levelling system. Each time you level up, pick up a random upgrade card! Actually 12, planned 50.
  • Procedurally generated! You’ll never play the same game twice!
  • Bang bang bang!
  • Achievements! Steam achievements and trading cards coming soon in the full version.
  • Everything is made by only one passionate dev!
  • And many more!

Hi, I’m Franck, but you can call me Hefka. NekoPunk, that’s a one-man project born in France in 2019. I spend a lot of time making my game and I put all my heart and soul in this project. I hope you’ll like it and don’t hesitate to support me, that means a lot to me!



See you in the mosh pit!

data.short_description: Humanity has been extinct. Now, there is even worse. Catgirls and rifles. Grab your rebel state of mind and get out of captivity in this savage roguelike! Oh, by the way, turn these procedurally generated mazes into a mosh pit!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 and above
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
